description: Try our easy to follow Nectarine & Almond Cake recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Tea cake,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Low salt,Sesame free,Baking,Mother's Day,Stone fruit,Soy free,Vegetarian,Peanut free
name: Nectarine & Almond Cake Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 6 nectarines, halved, stones removed, cut into wedges

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180Â°. Grease and line the base of a 20cm springform pan with baking paper.
Sift flour and baking powder together into a bowl. Stir in almond meal.
Beat butter and sugar together until very pale and creamy. Beat in eggs, one at a time, beating well after each addition.

Fold in flour mixture. Gently fold in buttermilk and vanilla until combined. Spoon half the mixture into pan. Arrange half the nectarines over the batter. Cover with remaining batter and fruit. Scatter over almonds. Drizzle with half the honey.
Bake for 4550 minutes until cooked when tested with a skewer. Drizzle with remaining honey. Cool in pan for 5 minutes then transfer to a wire rack to cool completely. Serve with cream.
